event.title: built by Felix Magennis of the Magennis clan in 1588

data.event: The name of the town is thought to derive from the castle built by Felix Magennis of the Magennis clan in 1588, which stood at the mouth of the Shimna River.

event.title: is referred to as New Castle in the Annals of the Four Masters in 1433

data.event: The town is referred to as New Castle in the Annals of the Four Masters in 1433 so it is likely that he built on the site of an existing structure.
